duties_responsibilities.duty: Support team members with key components of media relations plans and activations; including strategy and press material development
Maintain current/build new relationships with media across a variety of outlets to further understand and anticipate the needs of key reporters
Effectively pitch media with client news; proactively develop and offer fresh story angles in absence of client news; flag important news/trends to team members and clients
Research, prepare, and maintain media intelligence or audits and media lists for a variety of client announcements or new business proposals
Become well-versed in media tools such as MuckRack, Cision, Newswhip, etc.
Draft media monitoring reports and contextualize results for teams and clients; update and maintain media placement trackers
Proactively manage own time and meet weekly billability targets
Demonstrate ability to “manage up” to senior staff as well as help manage other junior team members and interns

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in a relevant field (PR, English, Communications, Journalism, Advertising) from an accredited college or university
